Elmer Baxter

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: E. B. Laflin
  3. Location of Family: Crab Orchard, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 14
  7. Date of Birth:
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242; Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914.
